doc:
Schlitzie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schlitzie 0 Schlitzie (alternatively spelled Schlitze or Shlitze; (September 10, 1901 – September 24, 1971), possibly born Simon Metz and legally Schlitze Surtees, was an American sideshow performer. He also appeared in a few films, and is best known for his role in the 1932 movie Freaks. His lifelong career on the outdoor entertainment circuit as a major sideshow attraction with Barnum Bailey, among others, made him a popular cultural icon. Schlitzie ( alternatively_spelled Schlitze_or_Shlitze ; ( September_10_,_1901 – September_24 , 1971 ) , possibly_born Simon_Metz and legally Schlitze_Surtees , was an_American_sideshow_performer . He also appeared in a_few_films , and is_best_known for his_role in the_1932_movie_Freaks . His_lifelong_career on the_outdoor_entertainment_circuit as a_major_sideshow_attraction with Barnum_ , among others , made him a_popular_cultural_icon .
